BackEnd_WikiLanguage.AdminOnlyToolTip: To mark a Room as an "Overbooking Room", please contact office@easybooking.at
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_apna_headline: Do you want to configure your prices more in detail?
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_apna_subHeadline: This module enables the possibility to configure your prices with more complexity.
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_apna_text1: The module activates the following menus:
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_apna_text2: Last Minutes, Long Stay Discount, Early Bird Discount, Charging Scheme Configuration and additional configuration of the prices for each room  or apartment
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_cmnat_text: At this point you will see the Channel Manager in your full version of JULIA, which gives you the possibility to set prices and availability for rooms and send them to connected portals from your JULIA. If you would like to have an overview of how Channel Manager works, check out this video:
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_cmna_text: Then you transfer your booking data manually and go into each of your sales channels to check availability, prices and restrictions. This is not only uncomfortable, but also a source of error, which can lead to double bookings! Save valuable work-time by managing all of this with just a few clicks!
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_ervna_subHeadline: You do not offer this additional service to your guests yet?
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_ervna_text1: This is a pity, because it not only benefits the customer, but also secures your sales and brings you up-to-date commissions.
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_ervna_text2: Do you really want to do without cancellation charges, just to keep your regular customers from getting upset?
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_ervna_text3: This is no longer an issue with European Travel Insurance.
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_meldna_subHeadline: "JULIA" now masters everything around Guest Registration!
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_meldna_text1: From now they can check-in online by using an electronic registration form, guests sub - or unsubscribe!
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_meldna_text2: But this is not the only one: "JULIA" always has an overview of guests who are to be registered and can print out their pre-filled registration sheets, which only have to be signed by the guest. The "online check-in" of "JULIA" gives your guests the possibility to submit all necessary master data before arrival. This means that you have a complete registration form on arrival, which guarantees a quick check-in on the spot. This not only saves you a lot of time, but also your guests!
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_meldna_text3: The Registration module for your "JULIA" is now available! *
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_pcina_headline: Features and benefits of Credit Card Verification
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_pcina_popupText: We have implemented new security standards for your guests which are booking over the booking mask, and using credit card as payment method. In order to still deliver this payment option as a service to your guests, please purchase the PCI module.
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_pcina_text: In order to retrieve the credit card details of your bookings, according to the current security standards, you need the module "Credit Card Details". This module allows you a secure and simple retrieval of all credit card details, through the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI)."
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_pna_subHeadline: JULIA also manages the sale of your package offers.
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_pna_text1: With content and pictures managed via the installation plugin on the website, you can display these offers online via the Booking Form and integrate them into JULIA's sales process.
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_pna_text2: Why should you do without this service for your guests and the great time saving benefits it offers to you also?
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_pna_text3: The well-tried and highly popular 'Package' module for your JULIA is always available for you at any time!
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_rechmna_text1: Why? JULIA likes to do this job in addition to her other tasks - professionally, without gaps and without time delays!
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_rechmna_text2: With the 'Invoicing' module, you also have options for adding additional products, and benefiting from a series of practical reports such as sales reports, arrival and departure lists, catering lists, down payment administration, etc.
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_rechmna_text3: This extra work comfort is a luxury you can enjoy - at a very reasonable price!
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_reportsna_headline: Need even more facilitation of the administration?
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_reportsna_text: With easybooking's reporting module, including check-in and check-out statistics, room maid lists, payment overview, sales reports and period reports, JULIA relieves you of even more work in the administrative area. Get these practical add-ons right now and save time for the really important things in life!
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_wna_subHeadline: Then you still have to do double maintenance - that does not have to be!
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_wna_text: With professionally designed & fully responsive website templates from easybooking, JULIA takes care of the maintenance work, and you always have the guarantee that your website will be displayed optimally and will work perfectly - regardless of whether your guest is on the Internet with a smartphone, tablet or PC!
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_wrmna_text1: Thanks to the room selection module, you have the possibility to individualize your booking offer, and meet the wishes of your guests when booking. As with a flight booking, your guest can choose and book their desired room based on their preferences, such as location.
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_wrmna_text2: The Room Selection module for your "JULIA" is now available!
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_wwna_subHeadline: This is a pity because your guests cannot use the new price comparison - and you have to wait for prices and categories for your website!
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.adScreens_wwna_text: Make it easier and offer your guests more service with WebWidgets. With the WebWidget modules, you have the possibility to integrate additional content or data from easybooking directly on your website.

BackEnd_WikiLanguage.CF_AddNewLocaleInfoBTNTooltip: Click here for a list of the data you need to change when you have activated a new lanugage
BackEnd_WikiLanguage.CF_AddNewLocaleInfoHtmlText:
• Room Admin - Room Category: Display Name and Description need to be translated
  • Hotel Admin - Cancellation: Cancellation text needs to be edited, if activated
  • Hotel Admin - File Admin: these files need to be uploaded for the new language (travelling directions, included services, other files that should be sent with the email)
  • Hotel Admin - Template Admin: If you have written custom text for the email templates, you can fill in these texts for the new activated language
  • Pricing Admin - Special Offers: Short- and Detail text have to be entered for each special offer
  • Pricing Admin - Catering: Check all the catering names for the new language
  • Pricing Admin - Charging Scheme: if Christmas, New Years Eve or other charging schemes exist, the tooltips for the new language need to be translated
  • Products: if you have added products you need to translate the product name, short text and long text.
  • FrontEnd - FrontEnd Templates: If you have modified the texts of the JULIA Frontend (for example the welcome text of JULIA) please translate these texts for the new language as well.
  • FrontEnd - SmallSearch: if you have the SmallSearch running on your website, please translate the text for the new language as well.

BackEnd_WikiLanguage.desklinePoolDeactivatedInfo:
Update 29.03.19
Â 
Dear JULIA - Users,
Â 
As expected, the first results of the legal review of the DesklineÂ® request pool are available.
Â 
The findings reinforce our assumption that the request pool in the current form should be deactivated for the time being. We endeavor to ensure the fastest possible reconnection and ask for your understanding that we also subject this legally very complex topic to a valid examination for you in your interest and examine it closely.
Â 
In the coming weeks, we expect further results in this context and hope to reach a final solution as soon as possible.
Â 
Best regards,
Your easybooking team
Â 
Â 
Original message:
Â 
Dear JULIA - Users,
Â 
The function of the DesklineÂ® request pool was temporarily deactivated by us.
Â 
For legal reasons, we are currently taking this action. We provide services and process data in the sense of the GDPR (Data Protection Ordinance) and consider it our duty as a processor within the meaning of Art. 28 DSGVO to draw our customers' attention to it and to inform, if from our point of view even doubts about the lawful transfer of data into our system. We will examine this fact for you in detail, including with our partners, and we hope to make the DesklineÂ® request pool available at this point as soon as possible. With this in mind, we expect to be able to make further statements by mid-March and will keep you informed about the results on an ongoing basis.
Â 
Best regards,
Your easybooking team

gdprAgreementFirstScreenBody.text:
Just in time for the 25th of May 2018 we implement the new General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of the European Union. We have updated our privacy policy to provide you with more information about how zadego protects your information, including information about how you can exercise your rights to its data.

Please take a few minutes to view these updates and make their selections on certain settings.

gdprAgreementFirstScreenTitle.text: Please check some important updates and settings.

gdprAgreementSecondScreenBody.text:
With the validity of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) from 25.05.2018, various services that we provide to you as our customer under the framework contract you have chosen, belong to data processing of personal data by us according to your instructions and on your behalf (so-called "Order processing").

For such contractual relationships, the law requires the conclusion of a contract processing contract between you as principal and us as contractor.

Below you can view the order processing contract with annex 1 and 2. The electronic form offered by us is sufficient. Please accept the agreement in electronic form below and click on "Agree and Continue" .

The PDF created after the submission of the form will be individualized with your name and your operating data and will be permanently available your easybooking backend at the tab "My Account".

gdprAgreementThirdScreenBody.text:
You are almost done! But please tell us the following as well:

I agree to receive information about services and products of zadego GmbH (for instance: information for actual system status, important privacy information, latest trends, ...) by mail or e-mail.

gdprAgreementThirdScreenHint.text: In order to be able to fulfill the subject matter of the contract and to keep you up to date on the current system status, guest communication or important system updates, you must agree that we may contact you.

ibeModalHeader.text: Should we integrate our new booking engine into your website free of charge?

ibeModalParagraph.text: Just let us know and we will do the job for you. You can check out the new booking Engine on our Demohotel.

invoiceInkassoNoticeText.text:
After several reminders we still haven't received any payments for your open invoice(s).
Therefore, we had to hand over this case to our lawyers. If we don't receive any payments within the next 14 days, we will lock your account until this issue is settled.

You can find a list of your open invoices and the open amounts under My Account. Please note that any additional late fees are not reflected there but still have to be paid.

Please also note that only payments directly to our lawyer are valid to resolve this issue.

When making the payment please always make sure to add the invoice number as reference. That way the payment can be easily assigned to your account.

If you have questions, you can contact us by creating a ticket in My EB

We hope you are able to resolve this issue soon,

Thanks,
Your easybooking team

invoiceLawsuitNoticeText.text:
After several reminders and attempts to receive all the payments of your open invoices, we were not able to do so. Therefore, we had to lock your easybooking account and access to your JULIA. Our lawyers are already informed and will be handling this from this moment onward.

If you have questions, you can contact us by creating a ticket in My EB

We hope you are able to resolve this issue soon,

Thanks,
Your easybooking team

invoiceMahnungSentNoticeText.text:
Unfortunately we haven't received any payments for your open invoice(s). Please transfer the money as soon as possible, but no later than 14 days from now. That way you can avoid any further measures and additional fees.

You can find a list of your open invoices and the open amounts under My Account

Please verify if you have already made the payment or take a quick moment to do that now. When paying by banktransfer please always make sure to add the invoice number as reference. That way our accounting team can easily assign the payment to your account.

If you have questions, you can contact us by creating a ticket in My EB

Thanks,
Your easybooking team

invoiceReminderSentNoticeText.text:
We are glad you are enjoying JULIA and easybooking!

Nevertheless we have noticed that one of the invoices in your account is still open.

You can find a list of the open invoices under My Account.
Please verify if you have already made the payment or take a quick moment to do so now. When paying by banktransfer please always make sure to add the invoice number as reference. That way, our accounting team can easily assign the payment to your account.

If you have questions, you can contact us by creating a ticket in My EB

Thanks,
Your easybooking team

locale_InfoText.text:
If you activated an additional language, you must complete the information in the following sections:

  • Room Administration - Categories: Display Name and Description.
  • Operation Settings - Cancellation Cancellation text if activated.
  • Operation Settings - Files: Must also be attached to the new language (route map, included services, other files to be included).
  • Operation Settings - Template Administration: If you have created individual texts for your email templates in the existing languages, these must now also be entered for the newly activated language.
  • Price Configuration - Packages: Enter short and long descriptions for the new language for each package.
  • Price Configuration - Board: Check whether the name of the catering for the activated language is correct.
  • Price Configuration - Extra Charges: If there are Christmas, New Year or other extra charges, the tooltips for the new language have to be translated.
  • Products: If you are working with products, the product descriptions for the new language must now be entered here.

trialWelcomeDialog_text.text:
Welcome to your personal Demo Version of easybooking/JULIA. This Demo Version is valid until {{expiryDate}}

It is very important for us to make sure that our clients receive a good overview of our booking system, and learn how to use it well. So to start you off we offer 2 training sessions, where we also answer any questions you may have. We would like to give you a short overview of how these training sessions are: Please click here to open the clip. Before you start with easybooking/JULIA, please watch this video.

If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to contact us: +43 5 09 08 222 or +49 30 311 947 77. You can also email us at office@easybookingsolutions.com

We hope you enjoy our Demo Version of JULIA!

activate.text: Activate deskline enquiry pool for my company

content.text:
Dear JULIA users,

As you know, we saw a change in the "Deskline enquiry pool" feature in the spring of this year (hereafter referred to as the "Enquiry pool") and the Enquiry pool feature was temporarily disabled. We did not make the decision easy at the time and had to live with criticism for them lately. Nevertheless, we believe that the procedure was required at the time. Various feedback from the market also confirms this fundamental view.

Nevertheless, we are pleased to inform you that we have taken appropriate measures to provide a fundamental possibility that makes it possible to reactivate the function "Deskline enquiry pool". It should be noted that no general activation is possible, but you (as the person responsible for the purposes of Art. 4 GDPR) have to decide whether an activation should be made for your company or not.

If your order from easybooking requires a re-activation of the "Deskline enquiry pool" function, please confirm the following checkbox and click on "Continue to enquiry pool"

popupContent.text:
You have instructed easybooking to reactivate the function "Deskline enquiry pool" in your order.

As you know, as part of this function, personal data provided via "non-binding booking requests" on the websites of tourist boards by potential guests (hereafter referred to as "guests") are transmitted to your company and then processed by you ,

Upon re-activation, they confirm that they fulfill all the conditions for processing the personal data provided under this function and that they are entitled to process this data.

In this context, we would like to point out that, in our opinion, the processing of personal data within the pool of requests is in your interest as well, since you process the data for your own purposes, namely the provision of offers to potential guests. As part of the activation, they therefore confirm that they are responsible for the processing of personal data (also under data protection law) in the enquiry pool and that easybooking as a processor in this context, in particular in the event that claims are to be asserted by third parties, is at fault. and to hold harmless.

At this point, we would like to inform you in principle how the data processed by this function are processed (and in particular stored) in JULIA:

The data is processed,
  1. in a first step to generate the offers according to the guest's time requirements and to send them to the guest,
  2. if necessary, to send reminders concerning sent offers to the guest
  3. quite generally to generate the time specifications of the guest corresponding bookings;
The data processed via this function are automatically anonymized as soon as possible
  1. the data taken from the function does not lead to an offer within 7 days to the guest,
  2. an offer has expired or
  3. can no longer lead to a booking due to the guest's time constraints,
  4. In general, it is clear that the processed data can not (anymore) lead to a booking.
In the event that a booking is made through the data processed via this function, the retention periods specified in our Privacy Policy apply.

They also confirm in the context of activation that they process the data to be processed in accordance with Article 5 of the GDPR (lawfulness of processing). In practical terms, this also means that invariably requests from a guest may be processed, the requirements of which can be met in full in terms of time (eg, specific duration of stay) and factual aspects (eg presence of the required features (swimming pool, etc.). In this context, we also believe that the purpose of data processing is relevant and, in our opinion, the data processed should therefore not be processed or used for any other purpose (eg sending out newsletters, sending out brochures).

You can also deactivate the "Deskline enquiry pool" function at any time. For this please click the responsible button in the opened Deskline Enquiry pool.

modulesPopupMobileWebsiteText3.text: For future orders, you can open the "Modules" tab and select all the modules you require.

modules_channelManager.text: Our integrated Channel Manager transfers your availabilities and prices to Booking.com, Tiscover, HRS, Deskline and other platforms. It is also possible, to service each Channel separately and offer different price structures on each platform.

modules_description.text: This is an overview for your already activated modules and those that are still available. Are you interested in a quote from your local sales representative or do you want to order a module directly, please click on a module that is marked with an 'X'.

modules_erv.text: The Travel Insurance module makes it possible for your guests to purchase a travel insurance directly via your booking interface. This request will automatically be sent to the insurance provider to conclude the contract - which protects both you and your guests!

modules_mobileWebsite.text: With easybooking it is possible to create a Fully Integrated and Responsive Website, using the information stored in your system. This website will be automatically filled, without any additional effort, purely by the information already stored. The modules 'Request Form' and 'Booking Interface' are already integrated into this website as standard.

modules_pciDSS.text: In order to retrieve the Credit Card Details of your Bookings, according to current security standards, you need the module "Credit Card Details". This module allows you a secure and easy to use method to retrieve Credit Card Details, through the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI).

modules_registrationForm.text: With the help of the Registration module, you can easily register your guests, complete registration forms, print guest cards and much more. The module can be used without provider settings or, depending on the region, you can set up a direct connection to Deskline, SW-Tech, Thaler and other providers.

modules_reports.text: The reporting system will help you with your daily duties by providing the most important lists and analysis like the arrival/departure list, catering report, stayovers, turnover preview, period-end closing, payment reports and much more.

modules_specialOffers.text: Create Packages and Special Offers as required, and make them available via your PMS and your website. This helps you to increase your occupancy with targeted offers.

modules_website.text: Generate a fully integrated website with easybooking! This website will automatically be filled with room information, images, prices, a category list, and enquiry/booking features. When you update information in easybooking, your website will automatically be up-to-date as well!

modules_webWidgets.text: With the web widget module you can tie content and information from easybooking with your website. No double maintenance anymore! Is easybooking up to date? Then the content on your website is up to date as well! Included are: Pricing Table, Category List, Availability Calendar and Price Comparison.

modules_wrm.text: Thanks to the 'Wish Room' module, your guests have the possibility to select and book specific rooms in the booking area. Through the Room Plan Image you have submitted, your guests can choose a room based on the location and the view, without paying an extra charge.

fernwartungDownloadText.text:
Click on the respective button for your system. A file containing the remote maintenance software will be downloaded. Open the file by clicking on it as soon as the download process has been completed successfully.

Now tell the support agent the address visible on the screen. This consists of 9 numbers, e.g. 333 333 333

headLine.text:
Do you have a question about easybooking/JULIA, or have a problem?

headLine_3.text: tips on how to create an effective request

headLine_tooltip.text:
- Provide a short description in the Subject field
- Provide a detailed explanation in the Description field
- Provide as much details as possible, like:
    - Booking number(s)
    - Invoice number(s)
    - Time periods and categories
    - Channels
    - Examples
    - Details to your website
    - Details to any other relevant systems
